name: 凯勒·沃瑟姆
introduction: Keller Wortham is a Georgetown University-trained medical doctor who also enjoys acting. Most recently, he played the role of David Schroeder in the RCN telenovela “Allá Te Espero,” filmed in Bógota, Colombia.As a highly sought-after medical expert, Dr. Wortham has been featured on numerous television news and information programs. He hosted and co-wrote the educational health show “What Happens Next” and his focus on obesity and related health conditions earned him a role as the medical consultant and co-host for the Lifetime series “Love Handles.” Dr. Wortham also has had the opportunity to branch out into acting, most recently playing the role of David Schroeder in the RCN telenovela “Allá Te Espero,” filmed in Bógota, Colombia.
